flawed_nl_solution:
Earl was on the 1 + 5 = <<1+5=6>>6th floor after going up 5 floors.
When he went down 2 floors, he was on the 6 - 2 = <<6-2=9>>9th floor.
Since he went up 7 floors, he was then on the 9 + 7 = <<9+7=16>>16th floor.
Since he is 9 floors away from the top of the building, therefore the building has 16 + 9 = <<16+9=25>>25 floors.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
